attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: For too long criminals rights have been considered before their victims. If someone chooses to abuse another persons Human Rights, surely they should be made to forfeit their own. Make Jails less like a holiday camp and more like jail to discourage more offenders from a life of crime. Why should we respect their Rights when clearly they have no respect for the rights of others?
